properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_NONMEM VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, DEFAULT )
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE FROM TB_NONMEM

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_STATUS, RESER_NO, RESER_NAME, R.CHECKIN_TIME, R.CHECKOUT_TIME, BICYCLE, PEOPLE, PAYMENT_PRICE, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_NUM, MAX_PEOPLE, M.CHECKIN_TIME, M.CHECKOUT_TIME, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_ADDRESS, HOTEL_PATH, ROOM_IMG FROM TB_NONMEM JOIN TB_RESERVATION R ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM M USING (ROOM_NO) JOIN TB_HOTEL USING (HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM_IMG USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_PHONE = ?
